title: Python 3 Support
subtitle: Tautulli now supports both Python 2 and Python 3
body:
Tautulli can also be installed on Windows and MacOS without needing to install Python. You can download the new app installer from the GitHub release page. See the GitHub wiki page for more details.

Note: If you are running Python script notifications, then you will still need Python installed.

title: Test News Item
body:
What are you waiting for?

I don't know. Something amazing, I guess.

Me too, kid.
